title: Open a Certificate of Deposit (CD)
description: A customer wants to open a 12-month CD with $10,000.

tasks.description: Present the available CD terms and their corresponding interest rates (APY).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly presents the rate for the 12-month CD.
Agent clearly explains the financial penalty if the customer withdraws the funds before the 12-month term is up.

tasks.description: Open the CD account and transfer the funds from the customer's savings account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully opens the new CD and funds it.
